statements: SELECT * FROM recruitment_metrics;
SELECT time_to_fill, cost_per_hire FROM recruitment_metrics;
SELECT time_to_fill, cost_per_hire, candidate_conversion_rate FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE time_to_fill > 30;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE cost_per_hire < 5000;
SELECT candidate_conversion_rate FROM recruitment_metrics ORDER BY candidate_conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE cost_per_hire > 500 ORDER BY time_to_fill DESC;
SELECT candidate_conversion_rate, time_to_fill FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE cost_per_hire < 1000;
SELECT AVG(time_to_fill), MAX(cost_per_hire) FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE candidate_conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT SUM(cost_per_hire) AS total_costs, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE time_to_fill < 30;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE cost_per_hire BETWEEN 200 AND 800 ORDER BY candidate_conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_metrics
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE date_recorded = '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM recruitment_strategies ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT strategy_name, time_to_fill FROM recruitment_strategies WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5
SELECT strategy_name, cost, conversion_rate FROM recruitment_strategies
SELECT * FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE date_recorded = '2022-01-01';
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE metric_value > 1000 ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value, date_recorded FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE metric_value < 500 AND date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM recruitment_metrics;
SELECT strategy_name, cost, conversion_rate FROM recruitment_strategies WHERE cost < 5000 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_metrics;
SELECT time_to_fill, cost_per_hire FROM recruitment_metrics;
SELECT candidate_conversion_rate FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE time_to_fill > 30;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, primary_channel FROM recruitment_strategies;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_results WHERE cost_per_hire < 5000;
SELECT time_to_fill, cost_per_hire FROM recruitment_metrics;
SELECT candidate_conversion_rate, cost_per_hire, time_to_fill FROM recruitment_metrics;
SELECT primary_channel, strategy_name FROM recruitment_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM recruitment_strategies;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_results WHERE time_to_fill > 30;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name FROM recruitment_strategies WHERE strategy_id = '1a9e8bc0-017d-4b1d-876e-49ed87fb80a4';
SELECT strategy_name, time_to_fill_days FROM recruitment_strategies JOIN time_to_fill ON recruitment_strategies.strategy_id = time_to_fill.strategy_id;
SELECT AVG(cost_amount) AS average_cost_per_hire FROM cost_per_hire;
SELECT strategy_name, conversion_rate FROM recruitment_strategies JOIN candidate_conversion ON recruitment_strategies.strategy_id = candidate_conversion.strategy_id;
SELECT * FROM recruitment_strategies;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_id FROM recruitment_strategies ORDER BY strategy_name DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, cost_amount FROM recruitment_strategies INNER JOIN cost_per_hire ON recruitment_strategies.strategy_id = cost_per_hire.strategy_id WHERE cost_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM cost_per_hire INNER JOIN time_to_fill ON cost_per_hire.strategy_id = time_to_fill.strategy_id;

SELECT strategy_name, time_to_fill_days, conversion_rate FROM recruitment_strategies LEFT JOIN time_to_fill ON recruitment_strategies.strategy_id = time_to_fill.strategy_id LEFT JOIN candidate_conversion ON recruitment_strategies.strategy_id = candidate_conversion.strategy_id ORDER BY time_to_fill_days DESC, conversion_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM time_to_fill;
SELECT recruitment_id, time_to_fill_days FROM time_to_fill ORDER BY time_to_fill_days DESC;
SELECT recruitment_id, cost FROM cost_per_hire WHERE cost > 500;
SELECT recruitment_id, cost, conversion_rate FROM cost_per_hire JOIN candidate_conversion_rate ON cost_per_hire.recruitment_id = candidate_conversion_rate.recruitment_id;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM recruitment_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%online%';
SELECT strategy_name, time_to_fill_days, cost FROM recruitment_strategies JOIN recruitment_data ON recruitment_strategies.strategy_id = recruitment_data.strategy_id
SELECT * FROM time_to_fill WHERE time_to_fill_days > 30 ORDER BY time_to_fill_days DESC
SELECT recruitment_id, cost FROM cost_per_hire WHERE cost < 5000 AND cost > 2000
SELECT strategy_name, conversion_rate FROM recruitment_strategies JOIN candidate_conversion_rate ON recruitment_strategies.strategy_id = candidate_conversion_rate.recruitment_id
SELECT * FROM recruitment_data ORDER BY recruitment_id LIMIT 5
